summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6235 for the improvement of Seaview Ave. from approximately 360 feet south of West 60th Street to West 80th Street; and certain other streets, avenues and right of way; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 89495, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
